oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Con Hunley Live in Concert -- 1983-04-02
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is from Con Hunley's (musician) live performance at Billy Bob's Texas in Fort Worth, Texas. The performance is hosted by Lee Arnold (host) for the: Lee Arnold in a Country Road Show. The performance was on April 02, 1983. The tape was created by the WHN radio network.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Con Hunley

(02:49) This Ol' Cowboy's Going Home (Con Hunley) -- (05:22) You Lay a Whole Lot of Love on Me (Con Hunley) -- (08:31) Lee Arnold hosts a commercial spot -- (08:38) International Harvester commercial
